title: Former Clipper On Sterling: 'He's Always Had A Bully Mentality'
teaser: Keyon Dooling, a former Los Angeles Clipper and founder of the Respect Foundation, discusses his time playing for the team under owner Donald Sterling.
contentencoded:
Keyon Dooling, a former Los Angeles Clipper and founder of the Respect Foundation, discusses his time playing for the team under owner Donald Sterling. Sterling has come under fire for racially inflammatory comments he allegedly made.

Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
